Must-Try Autumn Baking Recipes to Warm Your Home

September 22, 2024

As the season transitions, it’s the perfect time to explore a variety of fall baking recipes that highlight the rich flavours of autumn. From the warmth of spiced pumpkin to the sweetness of caramelized fruits, these delightful treats invite you to indulge your creativity in the kitchen. Whether you’re crafting a comforting bread pudding or a beautifully layered upside-down cake, each recipe offers a unique twist that captures the essence of the season. Plus, with the power of AI, you can generate endless recipe ideas at Recipes No Limits, allowing for limitless baking experiments that will delight your taste buds. Embrace the joy of baking this fall and discover how these flavorful creations can elevate your culinary experience!

#

Classic American Apple Pie

$15
320 kcal
Difficulty: 40%

Allergens:

Gluten

Dietary Tags:

VegetarianNut-Free

Tags:

DessertBakingClassic

Description

This timeless dessert is a must-try autumn baking recipe, perfect for cozy gatherings and holiday celebrations. Enjoy the warm flavors of fall with every delicious slice!

Ingredients

  • Granny Smith apples: 6 cups, peeled and sliced
  • Granulated sugar: 3/4 cup
  • Brown sugar: 1/4 cup
  • Ground cinnamon: 2 tsp
  • Nutmeg: 1/4 tsp
  • Lemon juice: 2 tbsp
  • Butter: 2 tbsp, cut into small pieces
  • All-purpose flour: 2 1/2 cups
  • Salt: 1/2 tsp
  • Unsalted butter: 1 cup, chilled and diced
  • Ice water: 6-8 tbsp
  • Egg (for egg wash): 1

Date Created:

9/18/2024

#

Autumn Spice Pumpkin Buns

$12.5
320 kcal
Difficulty: 60%
Servings: 12

Allergens:

glutendairyeggs

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Tags:

bakedsweetfall

Description

Savor the warmth of Autumn Spice Pumpkin Buns, a delightful fall treat filled with pumpkin puree and fragrant spices like cinnamon and nutmeg. These soft, fluffy buns are perfect for cozy mornings or as a sweet addition to your autumn baking recipes.

Ingredients

  • All-purpose flour: 4 cups
  • Pumpkin puree: 1 cup
  • Granulated sugar: 1/3 cup
  • Brown sugar: 1/3 cup
  • Unsalted butter: 1/4 cup
  • Milk: 1/4 cup
  • Eggs: 2 large
  • Yeast: 2 1/4 tsp
  • Salt: 1 tsp
  • Pumpkin pie spice: 2 tsp
  • Cinnamon: 1 tsp
  • Cream cheese: 4 oz
  • Powdered sugar: 1 cup
  • Vanilla extract: 1 tsp
  • Heavy cream: 2 tbsp

Date Created:

9/20/2024

French Blackberry Charlotte

$25
450 kcal
Difficulty: 70%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

dairygluten

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Tags:

dessertFrench cuisinespecial occasion

Description

Enjoy French Blackberry Charlotte, an elegant dessert with layers of sponge cake and creamy blackberry mousse. This delightful fall treat is perfect for autumn gatherings!

Ingredients

  • ladyfingers: 24 pieces
  • blackberries: 500g
  • sugar: 150g
  • lemon juice: 1 tbsp
  • gelatin: 2 sheets
  • heavy cream: 250ml
  • vanilla bean: 1
  • whiskey: 2 tbsp

#

Pear Pecan Crumble

$10
320 kcal
Difficulty: 30%
Servings: 6

Allergens:

nutsdairy

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Tags:

dessertcomfort foodautumn

Description

Enjoy a delicious Pear Pecan Crumble, featuring tender pears baked under a buttery pecan topping. This delightful dessert embodies the essence of fall with its nutty crunch and sweet fruit, making it a satisfying treat for any autumn occasion!

Ingredients

  • ripe pears: 4, peeled, cored, sliced
  • lemon juice: 1 tablespoon
  • granulated sugar: 1/4 cup
  • all-purpose flour: 1/2 cup
  • rolled oats: 1/2 cup
  • brown sugar: 1/2 cup
  • ground cinnamon: 1 teaspoon
  • salt: 1/4 teaspoon
  • cold unsalted butter: 1/2 cup, diced
  • pecans: 1/2 cup, chopped

Date Created:

9/20/2024

#

Zesty Ginger Cookies

$8.5
150 kcal
Difficulty: 40%
Servings: 24

Allergens:

glutendairyegg

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Tags:

dessertbakingcookie

Description

Treat yourself to Zesty Ginger Cookies, bursting with the bold flavors of ginger and a hint of citrus. These soft, chewy cookies are a delightful combination of sweetness and spice, making them a perfect snack for autumn and a refreshing twist on traditional holiday treats!

Ingredients

  • all-purpose flour: 2 cups
  • ground ginger: 1 tablespoon
  • ground cinnamon: 1 teaspoon
  • baking soda: 2 teaspoons
  • unsalted butter: 3/4 cup
  • brown sugar: 1 cup
  • molasses: 1/4 cup
  • large egg: 1
  • granulated sugar: 1/4 cup

Date Created:

9/20/2024

Caramelized Apple Cheesecake

$25
450 kcal
Difficulty: 75%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

dairyeggs

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Tags:

dessertcheesecakeapplebaked

Description

Delight in a Caramelized Apple Cheesecake, featuring a creamy cheesecake base topped with rich, caramelized apples. This indulgent dessert combines smooth textures with the sweetness of apples, creating a luxurious treat that captures the flavors of fall in every bite!

Ingredients

  • cream cheese: 500g
  • granulated sugar: 150g
  • eggs: 3 large
  • vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon
  • all-purpose flour: 2 tablespoons
  • sour cream: 200g
  • graham cracker crumbs: 200g
  • unsalted butter: 100g
  • apples: 3 medium
  • brown sugar: 50g
  • cinnamon: 1 teaspoon
  • lemon juice: 1 tablespoon

Date Created:

9/20/2024

#

Banana Bread with Spiced Walnut Topping

$12.5
320 kcal
Difficulty: 40%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

nutseggsdairygluten

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Tags:

baked goodsdessertsnack

Description

Enjoy Banana Bread with Spiced Walnut Topping, a moist and flavorful loaf infused with ripe bananas and topped with a crunchy blend of spiced walnuts. This delightful treat is perfect for savoring during the cooler months, offering a warm, comforting flavor that’s ideal for breakfast or a sweet snack!

Ingredients

  • ripe bananas: 3
  • all-purpose flour: 2 cups
  • baking soda: 1 teaspoon
  • salt: 1/2 teaspoon
  • butter: 1/2 cup
  • brown sugar: 3/4 cup
  • eggs: 2
  • vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon
  • sour cream: 1/2 cup
  • walnuts: 1 cup
  • cinnamon: 1 teaspoon
  • nutmeg: 1/4 teaspoon
  • sugar: 1 tablespoon

Date Created:

9/20/2024

#

White Chocolate Macadamia Cookies

$15
200 kcal
Difficulty: 40%
Servings: 24

Allergens:

NutsDairyEggs

Dietary Tags:

Vegetarian

Tags:

DessertBakingCookies

Description

Enjoy White Chocolate Macadamia Cookies, made with a soft, chewy base loaded with creamy white chocolate and crunchy macadamia nuts. This tasty treat is perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings any time!

Ingredients

  • Unsalted butter: 1 cup
  • Granulated sugar: 3/4 cup
  • Brown sugar: 1 cup
  • Vanilla extract: 2 teaspoons
  • Eggs: 2 large
  • All-purpose flour: 2 3/4 cups
  • Baking soda: 1 teaspoon
  • Salt: 1/2 teaspoon
  • White chocolate chips: 2 cups
  • Macadamia nuts: 1 1/2 cups, chopped

Date Created:

Pumpkin Spiced Bread Pudding

$12.5
420 kcal
Difficulty: 40%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

dairyeggsgluten

Dietary Tags:

vegetarian

Tags:

dessertautumncomfort food

Description

Discover Pumpkin Spiced Bread Pudding, a cozy dessert made with tender bread soaked in a spiced pumpkin custard. This comforting dish captures the essence of fall, offering rich flavors and warmth in every delicious bite!

Ingredients

  • day-old brioche bread: 6 cups, cubed
  • pumpkin puree: 1 cup
  • heavy cream: 2 cups
  • whole milk: 1 cup
  • granulated sugar: 1 cup
  • eggs: 4 large
  • vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon
  • ground cinnamon: 1 teaspoon
  • ground nutmeg: 1/2 teaspoon
  • ground ginger: 1/2 teaspoon
  • salt: 1/4 teaspoon
  • butter: 2 tablespoons, melted

Date Created:

9/20/2024

#

Peach Cardamom Upside-Down Cake

$15
350 kcal
Difficulty: 60%
Servings: 8

Allergens:

DairyEggs

Dietary Tags:

Vegetarian

Tags:

DessertSweetBaked GoodsFruit

Description

Peach Cardamom Upside-Down Cake features moist layers topped with caramelized peaches and a hint of aromatic cardamom. This cake offers a delightful blend of sweet and spicy flavors, making it a delicious choice for dessert!

Ingredients

  • Peaches: 4 ripe, sliced
  • Butter: 1/2 cup
  • Brown Sugar: 3/4 cup
  • Granulated Sugar: 1 cup
  • Eggs: 2 large
  • All-purpose Flour: 1 1/2 cups
  • Baking Powder: 1 1/2 teaspoons
  • Ground Cardamom: 1 teaspoon
  • Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
  • Milk: 1/2 cup
  • Vanilla Extract: 1 teaspoon

Date Created:

9/20/2024
